short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Input Method for Vietnamese Han Nom (ie. Chu Han and Chu Nom)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To start Han-Nom input on any webpage just click the "å–ƒ" icon on the top right side of your browser and wait until the icon turns green. Click again to stop Han-Nom input. Use TELEX method to type and a number key to insert a Han-Nom character. You can also use the mouse or touch gestures to insert characters. Dictionary is based on data from www.chunom.org
